title: [GAMEPLAY] Nidalee flying short distances over the map

embed.description: Ever since Nidalee was enabled again, I've seen the strangest Nidalee bugs. Frequently when an enemy Nidalee goes in and out of the fog of war, I...

body: This link says everything perfectly! She needs to be disabled until this is fixed! it's extremely annoying to vs a nidalee atm, specially in rank!

replies.body: This problem actually occurs with every champion, but it's only noticeable if you keep your eye trained on the mini-map. With Nidalee, it's just much worse, for some reason. Really annoying since her kit is reliant on her proximity to her enemies.

Its not just the minimap, i've realised every champ is like that. coming in and out of Fog of war she speeds up real quickly when she pounces sometimes, sometimes it looks like shes flashed(flash animation appears).. it is just extremely annoying and people have realised this and are starting to abuse it
